name: Unhackneyed ~Journey to Freedom ~
description:
On Unhackneyed your goal is to cross the ocean with a boat full of refugees, keeping as many people alive as it's possible. You're in a journey to freedom, running away from a devastating situation that consumed your country. Chose wisely what to do while facing the troubles of the voyage.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Unhackneyed is a submission to AFGRAL 2019

The game is under a free license

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

It is available in  English and French.

Language selection is within the game.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Our Team:

  • Art: Tunadel
  • Design: Carol Dot
  • Programming: Galo
  • Sound: Scowsh
  • French Translation: Igor Carnaúba
